definitions.definition: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)
a handwheel that is used for steering
forces that provide energy and direction
a circular helm to control the rudder of a vessel
game equipment consisting of a wheel with slots that is used for gambling
an instrument of torture that stretches or disjoints or mutilates victims
a wheeled vehicle that has two wheels and is moved by foot pedals
change directions as if revolving on a pivot
move along on or as if on wheels or a wheeled vehicle
